name: HeartCore (cc7imm7)
description:
==== ABOUT GAME ====

You are controlling a character that is connecting with the heart which is his life. When they are too far away from each other, they will break down. Either the heart or the character got damaged will cause the player to die. Try to reach the goal without hurting your heart.

==== CONTROL ====

Move

Pull

Jump

Restart

==== MEMBER ====

Art : beijubird ncy623

Program : cc7imm7 BunnyK

====CREDIT====

bgm: https://www.fesliyanstudios.com/royalty-free-music/download/8-bit-menu/287

**All levels are able to be beaten**
